item.title: Uttar Pradesh background
item.description: Task Aggregate data on Uttar Pradesh Data Sourced from Wikipedia and Wikimedia commons Electoral calendar Table 1: Election calendar with focus on Uttar Pradesh Date Kind Election 2021 National Rajya Sabha 2021 State Vidhan Parishad: legislative assembly 2021 State Vidhan Parishad: nominated 2022 State Vidhan Sabha 2022 State Vidhan Parishad: legislative assembly 2022 State Vidhan Parishad: local authorities 2022 State Vidhan Parishad: nominated 2023 State Vidhan Parishad: teachers 2023 State Vidhan Parishad: graduates 2024 National Lok Sabha 2024 State Vidhan Parishad: legislative assembly 2025 Not found Not found 2026 State Vidhan Parishad: teachers 2026 State Vidhan Parishad: graduates Other information R packages used include magick1, rsvg2, rvest3, and, kableExtra4.
